questionarray.instructions: Fill the blank. Use the present simple.
qarray: My sister and I _________ (not want) to see that movie.
The boys __________ (not know) how to cook well.

questionarray.instructions: Write the present participle (ing) form of the verb
Fill the blank. Use the present continuous.
qarray: The girls _________ (not enjoy) the football game.
aarray: isn't she coming/is she not coming

questionarray.instructions: Write the simple past form of the verb.
Fill the blank. Use the past simple.
qarray: My sister and I _________ (not want) to see that movie.
The boys __________ (not know) how to cook well.

questionarray.instructions: Put the words in the correct order.
qarray: / movies / go / They / often / to / the / .
/ mornings / usually / go / I / running / the / in /.
/ evenings / watch / television / always / the / We / in /.
/ She / homework / helps / daughter / never / her / her / with /.
aarray: They often go to the movies.
I usually go running in the mornings.
We always watch television in the evenings.
She never helps her daughter with her homework.

questionarray.instructions: Fill the blank with the correct form of the verb.
qarray: He _______ (wear) a t-shirt and shorts today.
Sue _______ (eat) a banana at the moment.
Look, Jenny and Jill ________ (go) to school.
Jenny and Jill usually _______ (cycle) to school.
The weather is good today. It __________ (not rain).
She ______ (not go) to Muscat two days ago.
